lines.text: let n be a long integer
A = array of long integers of length n / 2
for long integer i = 0 to n / 2 , read A [ i ]
lines.code: for ( long long i = 0 ; i < n / 2 ; i ++ ) cin >> A [ i ] ;

lines.text: let a , aa be long integers with a = 0 , aa = 0
let p be a long integer with p = n / 2
sort the values A , A + p
for long integer i = 0 to n / 2
lines.code: for ( long long i = 0 ; i < n / 2 ; i ++ )

lines.text: increment a by absolute value of A [ i ] - ( i * 2 + 1 )
increment aa by absolute value of A [ i ] - ( i * 2 + 2 )
print minimum of a , aa and newline
